sentences.en: Despite her handicap, Jane is able to hold down a full-time job.
sentences.cn: 简尽管有生理缺陷，却能够保住一份全职工作。

sentences.en: Greater levels of stress may seriously handicap some students.
sentences.cn: 压力的加重可能会给一些学生带来严重的负面影响。

sentences.en: He divulged nothing to him save the terrible handicap of being young.
sentences.cn: 他想不出个所以然来,只是想到自己年纪尚幼,极端不利.

sentences.en: He has a handicap of 200 metres.
sentences.cn: 他在赛跑中让了二百米.

sentences.en: He lost his leg when he was ten, but learned to overcome his handicap.
sentences.cn: 他10岁时失去了一条腿，但学会了战胜自己的残疾。

sentences.en: He lost his leg when he was ten, but learnt to overcome his handicap.
sentences.cn: 他10岁时失去了一条腿，但他学会了克服自己的残疾。

sentences.en: His golf handicap hovered between 10 and 12.
sentences.cn: 他的高尔夫球差点一直在10杆到12杆之间徘徊。

sentences.en: I see your handicap is down from 16 to 12.
sentences.cn: 我发现你的差点已从16杆降到了12杆。

sentences.en: It is arguable that this was not as grave a handicap as it might appear.
sentences.cn: 有证据表明，这种残障不如看起来那么严重。

sentences.en: It's certainly a crippling handicap taken on too early.
sentences.cn: 它当然是一场夭折的障碍赛,进展得太快了.

sentences.en: Losing our best player was a handicap to the team.
sentences.cn: 失去最棒的运动员对我队不利.

sentences.en: Not speaking the language is a real handicap.
sentences.cn: 不会讲这种语言的确是一个障碍。

sentences.en: She showed her mettle by winning in spite of her handicap.
sentences.cn: 那匹雌马尽管增加了负重而仍能获胜,可见很有耐力.

sentences.en: She was away from school for 15 weeks, a handicap she could have done without.
sentences.cn: 她有15周没上学，这给她带来了本不该有的障碍。

sentences.en: Some hearing-impaired children may work harder to overcome their handicap.
sentences.cn: 一些有听障的儿童可能需要花更大的力气来克服这一缺陷。

sentences.en: Still, despite that handicap, you've made an admirable Foreign Service officer.
sentences.cn: 不过, 尽管有这么点不足之处, 你还是个出色的外交官.

sentences.en: The charity is handicapped by lack of funds.
sentences.cn: 这个慈善机构因为缺乏资金难以开展工作。

sentences.en: The handicap of age she did not, in her enthusiasm, perceive.
sentences.cn: 她在兴奋的时候, 觉察不到年龄的障碍.成功的人总会这样说的.

words.tran_cn: 裁判人员；（赛马时）决定优劣条件之人

phrases.tran_cn: (赛马)免加额外负重（负重级别低于比赛规定应加的最低额外负重量）

trans.tran_cn: 障碍，缺陷，不利条件，给弱者增加的杆数（按击球次数计数，并随参赛者的进步而减少）
trans.tran_en: a situation that makes it difficult for someone to do what they want
to make it difficult for someone to do something that they want or need to do

trans.tran_cn: 妨碍，使不利，使（某人）行动和生活不正常
trans.tran_en: to make it difficult for someone to do something that they want or need to do
